title: Shared Stillness
description: Sit together in silence, hands touching, breathing slow.

title: Our Love’s Vow
tagLine: Light up your bond by revisiting a warm memory together.
description: This ritual invites you and your partner to share a joyful moment from your early days — a story that still brings a smile. By revisiting these memories, you nurture a sense of warmth, nostalgia, and play between you.
steps: **Settle In.** Find a comfortable, quiet spot to sit together, free from distractions.
**Take a Breath.** Pause for a few slow breaths, allowing yourselves to arrive in the present moment.
**Share Your Spark.** One partner goes first: recall and share a joyful memory from the early days of your relationship, focusing on details that still make you smile.
**Listen and Reflect.** The other partner listens fully, allowing the warmth of the memory to land. When it’s their turn, they share their own memory.
**Notice the Feeling.** Take a moment to notice any shift — perhaps lightness, closeness, or a renewed fondness — and thank each other for sharing.
howItHelps: By remembering and sharing joyful experiences from your past, you reconnect with the playful and loving foundation of your relationship. This lightens the atmosphere and renews your sense of closeness.

title: Shared Wonder Walk
description: Go on a walk in nature or city and share what sparks wonder.

title: Create a Love Offering
description: Cook, draw, or build something together that symbolizes your bond
